attributes.action: abolish register electric scooters with the dvla
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: abolish the need to register electric class 3 scooters with the dvla, this one more step in the direction of stealth taxation of the needy. we do not have these scooters because they are good! we have them because we need them to get around !! if there were proper routes for us, like there are for cyclist's we would not need to use the roads. we have to use the roads, because there not drop curbs at each 'end' of the pavements. so please cease this regisration, before it gets out of hand and hits the very people the scooters are there to help.
